Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: For me, Prozac temporarily lessened my appetite and then long-term seemed neutral. But reactions to meds definitely vary! If it is an effect of the Prozac there’s decent odds it will diminish as your body adjusts.    With concerns about side effects, talking to my doctor has been useful. We decide whether to wait-and-see or to adjust meds. That’s been way better than going cold-turkey on my own (which I’ve done...a few times. I’m a slow learner apparently.)
